name: walk_transit_and_bike_score
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zillow_v2.
Tool description: Access US and CA property data in JSON, CSV, or Excel formats. Search listings, compare zestimate home values, and discover agent details.
API description: Retrieve the Walk, Transit, and Bike Score for a property using its Zillow property ID (zpid).

zpid.description: The Zillow property ID of the property. Defaults to 20485700.
